name: Grilled Summer Vegetables
description: A great way to serve up seasonal vegetables at your next gathering.
preparation: Toss vegetables with oil. Place in a grilling pan.
Cook for 5 minutes, then turn using Grip & Grab. Continue cooking to lightly char vegetables, shaking pan frequently.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar. Liberally shake Garlicky Dill Topper overtop and season with Sea Salt and Black Pepper. Remove from heat and serve.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavors or colors (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

products.name: Grip & Grab
summary: The name says it all: Grip, grab, turn & flip anything and everything during meal prep, cooking, and serving. You’ll love the sturdy feel and how easy they are to open and close.
